item.title: Hello
item.description: Coming to you from nearly-nine-hundred lines of Emacs-lisp and a pittance of CSS. Do you really need more?Â 1 In time I’ll accumulate more bits and pieces of customization and configuration to apply, better expressing myself through this site. As it stands now this little veneer suffices, it’s never really about what’s on the cover anyway, but how effective the cover is at appealing to those that may appreciate the content.
